name: ExtensionEnglandRetrievalMechanism
title: Extension England Retrieval Mechanism
description: An extension to record the retrieval mechanism required to return content referenced by a DocumentReference.
purpose: This extension extends the DocumentReference to support the exchange of information required to enable return of content or documents referenced.
